titleInfo.title: Invitation to the Dedication of Buckman Hall

mods.abstract: Buckman Hall bears a plaque dedicating it "to the University faculty and Christian Brothes who have devoted their lives to teaching." With offices, classrooms, and an auditorium, it was dedicated on October 1, 1992. Mertie Buckman made one of the largest donations in school history to fund the building.
